trivia: Splatoon Animations (Now Splatshorts) were originally created to test GMOD animations for a separate YouTube channel. Focus shifted when 'How Nintendo Expects You to Listen to Music' gained a significant amount of views.
Promotional characters from throughout the Splatoon series are used as background characters and are simply named 'Inkling' or 'Octoling'.
The outro music being 'Blitz It!' pays homage to the first successful video, 'How Nintendo Expects You to Listen to Music', where Agent Z chooses to listen to 'Blitz It!'
Agent X's hair was originally the 'Tentacurl', but wanting each character to have a unique hairstyle, it was changed to the 'Tentatwists' to be unique from Agent 8.

'DOORS' is the only Splatoon Animation so far to have its name changed, originally being titled 'The Amazing Digital Door', in reference to the Amazing Digital Circus. It was changed to make the video more neutral.
Agent 8 was voted as the fan's favourite character in a poll in December 2023 with an over 50% majority against Agent 3 and Neo Agent 3.
agent z has 6 hours of total play-time on Source Filmmaker. All of it was spent trying to learn how to use the program and giving up.
Agent X plays the guitar. An original track of theirs is featured in 'Stories of the Agents' titled 'Sunrise Skirmish'.
Both Agent Z and Agent X's ringtones are variants of the 'Blitz It!' track. Agent Z's being a guitar variant and Agent X's being an 8-bit remix.
Agent 3's hair was originally orange in older videos as at the time, agent z did not know how to change hair colours in Garry's Mod.

Bonus: flattered that you're interested enough to go looking in the code (:
